thread.title: ‘Breaking English’ by Rafiq Bhatia Review: Accessible Experimentation

author: Jim Fusilli
title: ‘Breaking English’ by Rafiq Bhatia Review: Accessible Experimentation
text:
On “Breaking English” (Epitaph), guitarist-composer Rafiq Bhatia places his affinity for improvisational jazz in the context of electronic experimentalism. Given his recent history as a member of the electronic power trio Son Lux, that may not be entirely surprising, but the hybrid is effective and refreshing. This innovative electroacoustic music may rely less on the instrumental virtuosity of his previous work and more on his ability to sculpt synthetic sound, but Mr. Bhatia succeeds here by blending the seemingly distinct approaches.
